thumb.title: [TAS] GB 釣り先生 "game end glitch" by CasualPokePlayer in 02:18.08
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=767XCf665fw以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6607M TAS originally published on 2025-06-20 Here, CasualPokePlayer ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/CasualPokePlayer) would rather not bother with any of that and exploits bugs in the game programming to cause a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code that warps them right to the credits. For further information, you can read the author's notes on this page ( https://tasvideos.org/9738S ).
thumb.last_res_body: すずきしげるさん... 釣れ！ すずきしげるに喧... スズキが釣れたようだ ！？ 儀式 EDを釣る 釣れた！ NKT･･･
